entry.def: Divisional means relating to a division of a large organization or group.

example.ex: The team won the divisional championship...
An alarm links the police station to the divisional headquarters.
example.tran: 在部门总部和警察局之间连有警报器。

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to a military division;
2. serving to divide or marking a division;
3. constituting a division or an aliquot part of the basic monetary unit;

sentences.sentence: "American divisional (fractional) coins include the dime and the nickel"
"fractional currency is currency in denominations less than the basic monetary unit"
